byline.contributor: Michael Barbaro contributed reporting from New York.

headline.main: Hillary Clinton Calls Donald Trump a ‘Fraud’ Over University Revelations

keywords.value: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
keywords.name: organizations

snippet: Mrs. Clinton, campaigning in New Jersey, said testimony by former employees of Trump University showed how Mr. Trump “took advantage of vulnerable Americans.”
lead_paragraph: Mrs. Clinton, campaigning in New Jersey, said testimony by former employees of Trump University showed how Mr. Trump “took advantage of vulnerable Americans.”
